properties.NAME: LINDBERGH BLVD AND 84TH ST
properties.AREA_1: THE VICINITY OF THE NORTHEAST CORNER OF THE INTERSECTION OF LINDBERGH BLVD AND 84TH ST
properties.REMARKS: VENDING OF FRESH FRUITS AND VEGETABLES SHALL BE PERMITTED IN THE VICINITY OF THE NORTHEAST CORNER OF THE INTERSECTION OF LINDBERGH BLVD AND 84TH ST

properties.NAME: BELMONT AVE  AND GIRARD AVE
properties.AREA_1: THE NORTHEAST CORNER OF THE INTERSECTION OF BELMONT AND GIRARD AVENUES
properties.REMARKS: VENDING SHALL BE PERMITTED AT THE NORTHEAST CORNER OF BELMONT AND GIRARD AVENUES

properties.NAME: COTTMAN AVE
properties.AREA_1: THE SOUTH SIDE OF COTTMAN AVE BETWEEN BUSTLETON AVE AND BRADFORD ST
properties.REMARKS: THE SOUTH SIDE OF COTTMAN AVE BETWEEN BUSTLETON AVE AND BRADFORD ST MAY HAVE UP TO THREE VENDORS

properties.NAME: BUSTLETON AVE
properties.AREA_1: THE EAST SIDE OF BUSTLETON AVE BETWEEN COTTMAN AVE AND SAINT VINCENT ST
properties.REMARKS: THE EAST SIDE OF BUSTLETON AVE BETWEEN COTTMAN AVE AND SAINT VINCENT ST MAY HAVE UP TO THREE VENDORS
